thread.title: NBA players protest recent killing of unarmed black man in public service announcment and on court

title: NBA players protest recent killing of unarmed black man in public service announcment and on court
text:
NBA players protest recent killing of unarmed black man in public service announcment and on court 1:48pm IST - 00:54 
VIDEO SHOWS: PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT BY NBA PLAYERS FROM SACRAMENTO KINGS AND BOSTON CELTICS TO PROTEST RECENT KILLING OF STEPHON CLARK. STILL PHOTOS OF PLAYERS WEARING T-SHIRTS TO PROTEST BEFORE ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
VIDEO SHOWS: PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT BY NBA PLAYERS FROM SACRAMENTO KINGS AND BOSTON CELTICS TO PROTEST RECENT KILLING OF STEPHON CLARK. STILL PHOTOS OF PLAYERS WEARING T-SHIRTS TO PROTEST BEFORE Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pHbziB
